sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GOODS_NMPR( GOODS_CODE , NMPR_SN , NMPR_CND , SETUP_AMOUNT , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DE ) VALUES( #GOODS_CODE# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(NMPR_SN), 0)+1 FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR WHERE GOODS_CODE = #GOODS_CODE#) , #NMPR_CND# , REPLACE(#SETUP_AMOUNT#, ',', '') , 'N' , #WRITNG_ID# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS_NMPR SET CL_NM = #CL_NM# , FILE_CODE = #FILE_CODE# , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_GOODS_NMPR SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , UPDT_ID = #UPDT_ID# , UPDT_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CL_CODE , CL_NM , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DE , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DE , FILE_CODE FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR WHERE CL_CODE = #CL_CODE#

SELECT GOODS_CODE , GOODS_NM , GOODS_INTRCN , DELETE_AT , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DE , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DE , FILE_CODE FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR WHERE 1 = 1
AND DELETE_AT = #DELETE_AT#
ORDER BY WRITNG_DE, GOODS_CODE
